definition: to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to

sentences.english: And when Sarai dealt hardly with her, she fled from her face.
sentences.chinese: 于是，撒莱就苦待她，夏甲因此就逃走了。

sentences.english: Col. 3:19 Husbands, love your wives and do not be bitter against them.
sentences.chinese: 西三19作丈夫的，要爱妻子，不可苦待她们。

sentences.english: Husbands, love your wives, and be not bitter towards them.
sentences.chinese: 作丈夫的，应该爱妻子，不要苦待她们。

sentences.english: Because he hath loosed my cord, and afflicted me, they have also let loose the bridle before me.
sentences.chinese: 松开他们的绳索苦待我，在我面前脱去辔头。

sentences.english: The sons also of them that afflicted thee shall come bending unto thee;
sentences.chinese: 素来苦待你的，他的子孙都必屈身来就你。
